title: Small Town Adventures: Vacation in your backyard!
description: New York has NYC, California has LA and Nevada has Vegas. But outside of these tourist hot spots, there are local gems bursting with history and culture, true Americana style. Small town adventures can be the quick affordable vacation you need to get out of the city and into some of America’s cutest rural towns. In this episode, Nisreene looks into some of the best unknown small towns in America with author and photographer Matt Hranek
itunes:title: Small Town Adventures: Vacation in your backyard!
itunes:subtitle: Nisreene is joined by Matt Hranek of the William Brown project to unpack some of the best unknown small towns in America and what you should look for.
author: Podcast@expedia.com (Expedia)
itunes:author: Expedia
